name: Pittanko Takahashi
description:
GameJam Takahashi in Japan. Team C "Tunagaru".
It was an instant development team, developed in 30 hours.
This game is a competition game where highly connected players win. It was developed with the theme "connected".

- How to play -

1P : [ Z ] Key
2P : [ ↓ ] Key

- Staff -

Programmer : Isaka, Kaa, Suigin

Artist : VeLTiNA, Eruna, Haruma
